pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Prime Minister of Saint Lucia, Allen Chastanet, and Prime Minister of Saint Kitts and Nevis, Dr. Timothy Harris | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today in Ottawa with Prime Minister of Saint Lucia, Allen Chastanet, and Prime Minister of Saint Kitts and Nevis, Dr. Timothy Harris.

Prime Minister Trudeau expressed his condolences to those injured and killed by recent tropical storms in the Caribbean region, including Hurricanes Irma and Maria. Prime Minister Trudeau highlighted Canadian solidarity with the countries of the region and our assistance with recovery efforts.   

The leaders also discussed strengthening commercial relations, combating climate change and regional security. They reaffirmed the longstanding positive relations that exists between Canada, Saint Lucia, Saint Kitts and Nevis, as well as the Caribbean region, built upon strong people-to-people connections. Prime Ministers Harris and Chastanet also raised with Prime Minister Trudeau Canadian visa requirements.
